name: Before the Storm (itch) (ThAtThInG02)
description: A quick PowerPoint game made as a prequal to another game I am developing. You play as the head maid for the Queen of these lands and your job is to get back in time with the supplies for the royal party. As you are making your way back a storm starts to approach making it hard to keep walking, you must decide on how you will get back to the castle.
